name: Attachment Issues (StrongDarkrai)
description:
The player controls 2 different bodies, switching between the two at will (one at a time). Both bodies use the same controls, WASD to move, E to interact with objects (i.e. pick up boxes, press buttons, etc…), SPACE to switch bodies and the mouse to look around. R will restart the level in the event the player gets stuck. Every level will be split by a glass wall, preventing either body from reaching the other side (sides designated “L” and “R.” Objects interacted with on one side have an effect on the objects on the other side.

Was Made in 4 months for our Game Production class.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Developed by Ferret Fiesta:
